Name: AKAI NOROI
About the game: AKAI NOROI is a Asian / Japanese horror folklore inspired journey based upon it's own unique story. You are AKIO a 39 year old man troubled with addiction who recently lost his job as a sales representative for Tanjo Industries. Upon returning home one evening to your apartment in Japan, Tokyo, unforeseen events drag you into a nightmarish world. Explore the abandoned sleeping quarters, delve into the residents past. Investigate an ancient yurei curse and establish the truth about yourself and the mysterious disappearance of all the previous residents. Features: • Dynamic paranormal event system. • PS4 / XBOX ONE Controller support. • Psychological horror mixed with survival horror. • Stealth mechanics, visual storytelling and character progression. • Replay ability through three different endings leading to new areas depending on player choices. • Investigation through journals and environmental storytelling. • Unpredictable atmospheric gameplay with focus on intertwined stories revolving around the three endings. • Candles and flashlight as light sources. • Horrifying AI. • The game environment changes the longer you stay in it. • Immersive otherworldly realistic environment. • HUD objective and event system. Adjustable quality settings available inside the game through ESC > Options. View, create and manage keybindings of controls inside the game through ESC > Controls. Created by Aza Game Studio
